description: This file defines the AuthService class, which manages user authentication functionalities such as registration, login, fetching current user info, and logout in a Flutter-based frontend application for healthcare management.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class providing authentication-related methods for user registration, login, session retrieval, and logout.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, optional full name, and role, returning a UserPublic instance.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, retrieves user info, stores session, and returns UserPublic.

methods.name: me
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user's information.
